about: A lightweight client for managing MariaDB, MySQL, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, SQLite, Interbase and Firebird, written in Delphi and Lazarus/FreePascal

Inno Setup is an open-source installation builder for Windows applications by Jordan Russell and Martijn Laan. Since its introduction in 1997, Inno Setup has been trusted by developers and organizations of all sizes to reliably deploy software to millions of PCs worldwide.
Goverlay is an easy graphical interface to configure MangoHud, vkBasalt, and OptiScaler
The free and open source karaoke singing game UltraStar Deluxe, inspired by Sony SingStar™
Cheat Engine. A development environment focused on modding
Double Commander is a free cross platform open source file manager with two panels side by side.
fpGUI Toolkit is a cross-platform GUI toolkit using Free Pascal

Alcinoe empowers developers to build fast, modern apps without the usual complexity or performance bottlenecks. It keeps the focus on innovation—not tool constraints—delivering top performance, deep customization, and great cross-platform UX while staying independent of GAFA ecosystems.
PS4 compatibility layer (emulator) on Free Pascal
Tabbed notebook with RichText editor, multi-level notes and strong encryption.

Integrating advanced flight simulation with PX4 SITL, this plugin adds support for hybrid VTOLs, fixed-wing, and multirotor aircraft in X-Plane. Perfect for researchers and hobbyists interested in drone and flight dynamics simulation.

Skia4Delphi is a cross-platform 2D graphics API for Delphi platforms based on Google's Skia Graphics Library. It provides a comprehensive 2D API that can be used across mobile, server and desktop models to render images.
